title: help
body:
Ping statistics for 74.125.199.99:

 usually 88 happend after 7.2 patch

replies.body:
I'm not sure where this is routing to exactly.  Are you having an issue staying connected in game?  You can grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and rout directly to the NA server for a clear trend in your routing: 104.160.131.1

Let me know what you find, as well as some more specifics!
